statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE provider_id = 12345;
SELECT provider_id, patient_id, interaction_date FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE compliance_status = 'Completed';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_provider_interactions;
SELECT provider_id, interaction_date, compliance_status FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE patient_id = 67890;
SELECT patient_id, interaction_type FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE provider_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE provider_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM healthcare_provider_interactions GROUP BY provider_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' AND interaction_type LIKE '%Appointment%' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT provider_id, patient_id, interaction_type FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Consultation', 'Follow-up') ORDER BY provider_id, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM healthcare_provider_interactions GROUP BY provider_id ORDER BY unique_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT healthcare_provider_id, interaction_type FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT standard_description, compliance_level FROM regulatory_standards WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM healthcare_provider_interactions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, interaction_type FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT hpi.*, rs.standard_description FROM healthcare_provider_interactions hpi JOIN regulatory_standards rs ON hpi.compliance_status = rs.compliance_level;
SELECT patient_id, healthcare_provider_id, compliance_status FROM healthcare_provider_interactions WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions_log WHERE interaction_type='Consultation' AND notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, COUNT(*) FROM patient_records GROUP BY patient_id, provider_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions_log WHERE interaction_type = 'Appointment' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_id, patient_id FROM interactions_log WHERE provider_id = 1 OR patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT location, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) FROM patient_records GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT * FROM interactions_log WHERE provider_id = 123 AND patient_id = 456 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT provider_id, AVG(compliance_status) AS average_compliance FROM compliance_reports GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT * FROM provider;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM provider WHERE provider_type='Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, notes FROM interaction WHERE provider_id=3 AND patient_id=5;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, location FROM provider WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital' ORDER BY provider_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM patient WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Consultation' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT diagnosis_code, diagnosis_description FROM diagnosis WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY diagnosis_code ASC
SELECT prescription_date, medication_name, dosage, instructions FROM prescription WHERE patient_id = 2002 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
